AntiProjects Antioch Sanders

It Works I Guess? Making an Enclosure

Written 2018-08-30

The first day I went to test the electric longboard, it rained for a week. My solution is the enclosure I’ve made. It’s very “rough”, but it works pretty well, so here it is.

Material

The first enclosure I made was out of acrylic. I put it in a storage room during a party with younger children, and I came back to find it broken.
